category: Herbs That Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Dispels Heat and Dampness and removes toxins

indications: Malaria, jaundice, furuncle, erysipelas, pain due to pus and Blood in the ear
Migratory arthralgia, rheumatalgia, ascites, edema, Lin Syndrome, stranguria with hematuria, lower abdominal pain

action.primary: Regulates the circulation of Qi, invigorates the Blood and dispels Phlegm

indications: Cancer, tumors, swellings, lumps, lower abdominal pain due to Qi Stagnation, abdominal pain due to ascariasis in children
